name: Steelbreakers
description:
Steelbreakers is a competitive action game where you fight your friends! Hack, slash, shoot and run to defeat your opponents and emerge victorious!

Play with up to four players on various maps. Customize your weapon loadout to go in with, and defeat your opponents!

The full release of the game will include additional features such as netplay, additional game modes, new maps, weapons, AI enemies, music and additional quality of life improvements. Try out the demo in the meantime!
